mapper.select: SELECT id, name, description, customer, from_date, to_date, chat_id FROM `group` WHERE `group`.id = #{id}

SELECT `group`.id, `group`.name, `group`.description, `group`.customer, `group`.from_date, `group`.to_date, `group`.chat_id, `customer`.name as customerName FROM `group` LEFT JOIN `customer` on `group`.customer = `customer`.id
AND name like concat('%',#{name},'%')
ORDER BY `group`.from_date DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO `group`( id, name, customer, from_date, to_date, description, create_by, create_date, update_date, remarks ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{name}, #{customer}, #{fromDate}, #{toDate}, #{description}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks} )
mapper.update: UPDATE `group` SET name = #{name}, from_date = #{fromDate}, to_date = #{toDate}, description = #{description}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
